rules_text:
Flying
When Sahra’s Harbinger enters, reveal the top six cards of an opponent’s library and separate them into two piles. That opponent chooses one of those piles and puts it into their hand. You may cast any number of nonland cards in the other pile without paying their mana costs.
notes:
!exportname Sahras Harbinger
blue black red green
four color creature cycle
Sahra
